title: A display extension is possible anywhere with this 13.3-inch portable monitor, now only $144.97
content:
Macworld

A second screen is incredibly handy, but unfortunately, they’re not designed for easy portability. However, if you’ve ever wanted to bring more screen real estate to and from the office or a cafe to work remotely, you can do so with this portable display monitor, on sale for only $144.97 (reg. $169) through March 17.

With 2K resolution, 16:10 aspect ratio, and 2560×1600 high resolution, you can enjoy this monitor’s crisp visuals, which also have a 1000:1 contrast ratio and 60Hz refresh rate. Its IPS panel offers a wide viewing angle of 178°, ensuring a refined and natural viewing experience. Meanwhile, its petite size (1.41 lbs) and slim profile (just 0.3 inches wide) allow users to bring this display anywhere, whether that’s working during a train commute or at the coffee shop.

Equipped with a full-featured USB-C Type-C port and an HDMI port, this monitor is compatible with most devices, including MacBooks, PCs, etc. It also has multiple modes for extra versatility, including copy, expansion, and second screen mode. 

Expand your viewing experience anywhere when you grab this 13.3″ 2K Portable IPS Display Monitor, now just $144.97 through March 17 11:59 PM Pacific.
